dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.description: Python tools for GATE, see https://github.com/OpenGATE/Gate

dependent_to.description:
GNU Radio is a free & open-source software development toolkit that
provides signal processing blocks to implement software radios. It can
be used with readily-available, low-cost external RF hardware to create
software-defined radios, or without hardware in a simulation-like
environment. It is widely used in hobbyist, academic, and commercial
environments to support both wireless communications research and real-
world radio systems.
dependent_to.name: gnuradio

dependent_to.description:
mdb is a command line debugger aimed at parallel programs using the MPI
programming paradigm.
dependent_to.name: mdb

dependent_to.description: A python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.
dependent_to.name: nf-core-tools

dependent_to.description:
A library for detecting, labeling and reasoning about
microarchitectures.
dependent_to.name: py-archspec

dependent_to.description:
The BIOM file format (canonically pronounced biome) is designed to be a
general-use format for representing biological sample by observation
contingency tables.
dependent_to.name: py-biom-format

dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.
dependent_to.name: py-black

dependent_to.description: A catch-all compile-tool wrapper.
dependent_to.name: py-blight

dependent_to.description:
CEKit is a Container image creation tool. CEKit helps to build container
images from image definition files with strong focus on modularity and
code reuse.
dependent_to.name: py-cekit

dependent_to.description: Celery - Distributed Task Queue.
dependent_to.name: py-celery

dependent_to.description: Command line program to validate and convert CITATION.cff files.

Python interface to map GRIB files to the NetCDF Common Data Model
following the CF Convention using ecCodes.

dependent_to.name: py-chalice

dependent_to.name: py-click-didyoumean

click-option-group is a Click-extension package that adds option groups
missing in Click.

An extension module for py-click to register external CLI commands via
setuptools entry-points.

dependent_to.name: py-click-repl

Common arguments and options for GeoJSON processing commands, using
Click.
dependent_to.name: py-cligj

dependent_to.name: py-climax

dependent_to.description: Lightweight Python STOMP message broker.
dependent_to.name: py-coilmq

dependent_to.description: Additional utilities for click.
dependent_to.name: py-consolekit

dependent_to.description:
A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project
templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.
dependent_to.name: py-cookiecutter

dependent_to.description: fast vcf parsing with cython + htslib
dependent_to.name: py-cyvcf2

dependent_to.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.
dependent_to.name: py-dask

dependent_to.description: A command line interface for Databricks.

dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependent_to.description:
This software implements the metadata model that datalad and datalad-
metalad will use in the future (datalad-metalad>=0.3.0) to handle
metadata.
dependent_to.name: py-datalad-metadata-model

dependent_to.description:
Devito is a Python package to implement optimized stencil computation.
(e.g., finite differences, image processing, machine learning) from
high-level symbolic problem definitions. Devito builds on SymPy and
employs automated code generation and just-in-time compilation to
execute optimized computational kernels on several computer platforms,
including CPUs, GPUs, and clusters thereof.
dependent_to.name: py-devito

dependent_to.description: Distributed scheduler for Dask
dependent_to.name: py-distributed

dependent_to.description: Stochastic optimization routines for Theano
dependent_to.name: py-downhill

dependent_to.description:
Python script to download global terrain digital elevation models, SRTM
30m DEM and SRTM 90m DEM.
dependent_to.name: py-elevation

dependent_to.description:
Fava is a web interface for the double-entry bookkeeping software
Beancount with a focus on features and usability.
dependent_to.name: py-fava

dependent_to.description: Fiona reads and writes spatial data files.
dependent_to.name: py-fiona

dependent_to.description:
fitter package provides a simple class to identify the distribution from
which a data samples is generated from. It uses 80 distributions from
Scipy and allows you to plot the results to check what is the most
probable distribution and the best parameters.
dependent_to.name: py-fitter

dependent_to.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.
dependent_to.name: py-flask

dependent_to.description: Geocoder is a simple and consistent geocoding library.
dependent_to.name: py-geocoder

dependent_to.description: Tool to convert geopandas vector data into rasterized xarray data.
dependent_to.name: py-geocube

dependent_to.description: Parser tools for Mozilla's Glean telemetry.
dependent_to.name: py-glean-parser

dependent_to.description:
Globus CLI is a standalone application that can be installed on the
user's machine and is used to access the Globus service. The CLI
provides an interface to Globus services from the shell, and is suited
to both interactive and simple scripting use cases.
dependent_to.name: py-globus-cli

dependent_to.description: Command-line utilities to assist in managing Galaxy servers
dependent_to.name: py-gravity

dependent_to.description: Modern, extensible Python project management
dependent_to.name: py-hatch

dependent_to.description: Validation schema and code for HEPdata submissions.

dependent_to.description: Pretty print of NumPy (and other) histograms to the console
dependent_to.name: py-histoprint

dependent_to.description: JEDI Configuration Builder
dependent_to.name: py-jcb

dependent_to.description: The deep learning framework to pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models.
dependent_to.name: py-lightning

dependent_to.description: Lightning AI Command Line Interface.
dependent_to.name: py-lightning-cloud

dependent_to.description: Work with Loom files for single-cell RNA-seq data.

dependent_to.description: Web mercator XYZ tile utilities.

dependent_to.description:
MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator
that's geared towards building project documentation.
dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs

dependent_to.description: MLflow: A Platform for ML Development and Productionization.
dependent_to.name: py-mlflow

dependent_to.description:
Create a source of truth for ML model results and browse it on Papers
with Code
dependent_to.name: py-model-index

dependent_to.description: Python morphology manipulation toolkit
dependent_to.name: py-morph-tool

dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.
dependent_to.name: py-multiqc

dependent_to.description:
Background noise and signal reverberation due to reflections in an
enclosure are the two main impairments in acoustic signal processing and
far-field speech recognition. This work addresses signal dereverberation
techniques based on WPE for speech recognition and other far-field
applications. WPE is a compelling algorithm to blindly dereverberate
acoustic signals based on long-term linear prediction.
dependent_to.name: py-nara-wpe

dependent_to.description:
Flexible metadata store for MLOps, built for research and production
teams that run a lot of experiments.
dependent_to.name: py-neptune-client

dependent_to.description: Python library neuron morphology analysis
dependent_to.name: py-neurom

dependent_to.description: Neuroimaging in Python: Pipelines and Interfaces.
dependent_to.name: py-nipype

dependent_to.description:
The Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) is a Python package for natural
language processing.
dependent_to.name: py-nltk

dependent_to.description: OpenDataLab Python SDK
dependent_to.name: py-opendatalab

dependent_to.description: MIM Installs OpenMMLab packages
dependent_to.name: py-openmim

dependent_to.description: Parametrize and run Jupyter and nteract Notebooks.
dependent_to.name: py-papermill

dependent_to.description: Python client library and CLI for Planet's public API
dependent_to.name: py-planet

dependent_to.description: Python library for interacting with the Microsoft Planetary Computer.
dependent_to.name: py-planetary-computer

dependent_to.description:
Py2neo is a client library and toolkit for working with Neo4j from
within Python applications and from the command line.
dependent_to.name: py-py2neo

dependent_to.description: bids: interface with datasets conforming to BIDS
dependent_to.name: py-pybids

dependent_to.description:
Read key-value pairs from a .env file and set them as environment
variables
dependent_to.name: py-python-dotenv

dependent_to.description: A Python ASGI web microframework with the same API as Flask.
dependent_to.name: py-quart

dependent_to.description: A Python client for Radiant MLHub.
dependent_to.name: py-radiant-mlhub

dependent_to.description:
Rasterio reads and writes geospatial raster data. Geographic information
systems use GeoTIFF and other formats to organize and store gridded, or
raster, datasets. Rasterio reads and writes these formats and provides a
Python API based on N-D arrays.
dependent_to.name: py-rasterio

dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.
dependent_to.name: py-ray

dependent_to.description: A python script for tabular display of slurm efficiency information.
dependent_to.name: py-reportseff

dependent_to.description:
The intention of rich-click is to provide attractive help output from
click, formatted with rich, with minimal customisation required.
dependent_to.name: py-rich-click

dependent_to.description: RO-Crate metadata generator/parser
dependent_to.name: py-rocrate

dependent_to.description:
RQ (Redis Queue) is a simple Python library for queueing jobs and
processing them in the background with workers.
dependent_to.name: py-rq

dependent_to.description: LGPL MosesTokenizer in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-sacremoses

dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp

dependent_to.description: A Client of HIVdb Sierra GraphQL Webservice
dependent_to.name: py-sierrapy

dependent_to.description: Snuggs are s-expressions for Numpy
dependent_to.name: py-snuggs

dependent_to.description:
Sphinx plugin that allows you to automatically extract documentation
from a Click-based application and include it in your docs
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-click

dependent_to.description: The fastest way to build data apps in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-streamlit

dependent_to.description: A package for creating and drawing trees.
dependent_to.name: py-tree

dependent_to.description: Typer, build great CLIs. Easy to code. Based on Python type hints.

dependent_to.name: py-usgs

dependent_to.name: py-uvicorn

dependent_to.description:
Python library for reading, writing, and manipulating large-scale
vasculature datasets
dependent_to.name: py-vascpy

dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.
dependent_to.name: py-wandb

dependent_to.description: A simple Python wheel builder for simple projects.
dependent_to.name: py-whey

dependent_to.description:
The SpECTRE numerical relativity code. SpECTRE is an open-source code
for multi-scale, multi-physics problems in astrophysics and
gravitational physics. In the future, we hope that it can be applied to
problems across discipline boundaries in fluid dynamics, geoscience,
plasma physics, nuclear physics, and engineering. It runs at petascale
and is designed for future exascale computers. SpECTRE is being
developed in support of our collaborative Simulating eXtreme Spacetimes
(SXS) research program into the multi-messenger astrophysics of neutron
star mergers, core-collapse supernovae, and gamma-ray bursts.
dependent_to.name: spectre
